The red is a bit more toward orange than I expected from the photo but I like the top enough that I'm okay with the color variation even though I'm usually very particular about color.  One item to point out: I am typically a 2/4 in top size depending on closure and desired fittedness. The smallest size offered (small) is for 4/6. You CAN cinch the corseting back down farther; but if you want to go smaller than a 4, this will draw the armholes back so they sit oddly under the armpit. This is an issue of size, not a problem with the product (and I knew the size was a gamble), so it still gets five stars. The alteration to fix this will be simple, just be advised if you're small and can't or don't care to take in the sides a smidge.
Fits well, lace in back could have been a little more thicker but all in all, would buy again.
